title: Blood Prophecy: The Fated Three
description: The darkness is rising. Thousands of years ago, a prophecy was foretold and now it has awakened… 17-year-old Selene Giovanni loses her father at a young age and is forever separated from her peers by the experience and an abusive mother.When a young stranger, Gregori, starts at her school, Selene’s world changes dramatically. Her once dull and lonely life becomes exciting and dangerous.With vampires and werewolves around every corner, Selene must make a choice between love, death and the fate of the world. And that is only the beginning…http://apostrophebooks.com/books/bloo...
author: T.L.  Spencer
